In[47]:= symboliclegendre[n_,x_]:=Solve[LegendreP[n,x]==0];
legendreprime[n_,a_]:=D[LegendreP[n,x],x]/.x->a;
weights[n_,x_]:=2/((1-x^2) legendreprime[n,x]^2);
h=128;
precision=10;
str=OpenWrite["lgvalues.txt"];
Write[str,"abcissae"];
Do[Write[str];Write[str,n];Write[str];
nlist=symboliclegendre[n,x];
xnlist=x/.nlist;
Do[Write[str,N[Part[xnlist,i],precision]],{i,Length[xnlist]}];,{n,127,h}];
Write[str,"weights"];
Do[Write[str];Write[str,n];Write[str];
slist:=symboliclegendre[n,x];
xslist=x/.slist;
Do[Write[str,N[weights[n,Part[xslist,i]],precision]],{i,Length[xslist]}];,{n,127,h}];
Close[str];
In[58]:= FilePrint["lgvalues.txt"]
During evaluation of In[58]:=
"abcissae"
